Active now Offline Onboard image I\'m a new user I\'m a returning user Profile selection image Name field icon User id copy User id qr Image EXPORT MY PROFILE Copied Open Source Edition Telemesh is a messaging app designed with Blockchain and Mesh networking. Unlike traditional messaging app Telemesh works with both internet and without internet connectivity. Telemesh is actively maintained by W3 Engineers Ltd. Copyright 2019 W3 Engineers Ltd.
